events.message: I have filed a claim after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle on Main Street.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident due to the reported car collision incident.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your claim related to the vehicle accident.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and we will be processing it shortly.
Please provide the police report and photos of the damaged vehicle to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including police report and accident photos have been submitted successfully.
The investigation into your car collision claim has commenced and we will keep you updated.
The investigation regarding your vehicle accident claim has been completed without issues.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damages assessed from the auto accident.
Thank you for your prompt response and acceptance of the proposed settlement offer.
Your auto accident claim has been officially approved by the claims department today.
We have issued the payment for your approved vehicle accident claim to your registered account.
Your auto accident claim is now closed following successful payment and settlement.
The case files for your car accident claim have been archived for record-keeping purposes.
